heading: Division of fractions and practice reducing fractions to the lowest terms.

topics.heading: Division of fractions and practice reducing fractions to the lowest terms.

questions.question: Mia wants to divide 11/4 of a basket of tomatoes into 3/7 basket portions. How many portions will she get?
If Mia has 13/4 of a cucumber and she packs it into containers holding 1/17 of a cucumber each, how many containers does she use?
Mia has 3/2 of a field planted with carrots. How many sections will she have if she divides this equally among 7/6-acre sections?
Mia packs 14/5 of a carrot into bags of 17/2 of a carrot each. How many bags does she have?
Mia has 80/20 of a cucumber and wants to divide it into sections of 9/7 of a cucumber each. How many sections will she get?
Mia wants to pack 21/6 of a tomato into containers holding 30/5 of a tomato each. How many containers can she fill?
Mia packs 15153 carrots into packages of 9125 a carrot each. How many packages does she make?
Mia has 428 cucumbers. If she packs them into bundles holding 345 cucumber each, how many bundles does she get?
Mia has 72/20 of a field planted with carrots. She divides this equally into 4/3-acre plots. How many plots does she have?
If Mia has 12/13 of a basket of tomatoes and divides it into portions of 8/1 of a basket each, how many portions does she get?
Mia has 1232 tomatoes and wants to pack them into containers holding 2/1 of a tomato each. How many containers will she make?
Mia has 15120 cucumbers and wants to pack them into portions of 12120 cucumber each. How many portions will she fill?
Mia wants to distribute 9/7 of a cucumber into bags weighing 26/6 of a cucumber each. How many bags can she fill?
Mia needs to pack 312 carrots into bags weighing 9/8 of a carrot each. How many bags will she fill?
Mia is dividing 2130 carrots into portions of 4150 a carrot each. How many portions does she make?
Mia has 4112 of a tomato and packs them into containers of 9/0 of a tomato each. How many containers does she have?
Mia has 1115 carrot and packs it into containers holding 6 carrots each. How many containers will she have?
Mia has 10017 tomatoes and packs them into containers holding 14022 tomato each. How many containers does she get?
Mia has 9423 tomatoes and she divides them into servings of 9145 tomato each. How many servings will she get?
Mia has 12510 cucumbers and she packs them into units of 20 of a cucumber each. How many units does she get?
